creator: Patels Developer
descriptionHtml:
This app provides keyboard shortcuts for Software IDEs, Studios, Browsers, Players, and Converters.
It will help you to make navigation and interaction with the software easily. So, you can save your time and improve
your work performance.

List of category by operating systems
Windows
Mac
Linux

Use shortcut keys as an alternative to the mouse when working with your system.
Use keyboard shortcuts boost your productivity and improve your work efficiency.

You can use Keyboard Shortcuts instead of mouse.

Collection of Keyboard Shortcut keys by software is mentioned below and don’t worry more shortcuts are added with the time.

Adobe Acrobat Reader Shortcuts
Adobe After Effects Shortcuts
Adobe Photoshop Shortcuts
Adobe Illustrator Shortcuts
Adobe Dreamweaver Shortcuts
Adobe Animate Shortcuts
Adobe Audition Shortcuts
Adobe Bridge Shortcuts
Adobe Story Shortcuts
Adobe SpeedGrade Shortcuts
Adobe Prelude Shortcuts
Adobe Muse Shortcuts
Adobe Lightroom Shortcuts
Adobe Premiere Pro Shortcuts
Adobe InDesign Shortcuts
Adobe InCopy Shortcuts
Adobe Experience Design Shortcuts
Adobe Encore Shortcuts
Adobe Premiere Elements Shortcuts
Android Studio Shortcuts
Brackets Shortcuts
Microsoft Word Shortcuts
Microsoft Excel Shortcuts
Notepad++ Shortcuts
Visual Studio Code Shortcuts
Visual Studio IDE Shortcuts
IntelliJ IDEA Shortcuts
PhpStorm Shortcuts


Disclaimer:
All the contents are under their owner’s license and the credit goes to their respective owners. These contents are not endorsed by any of the prospective owners, and the Logos, Names are used simply for educational purposes. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the Logos, Names will be
honoured.




Type of Shortcuts

Software shortcuts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and improvements

title: Keyboard Shortcuts - Direct Shortcuts

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Encrypt and decrypt your personal files with secure algorithm.

This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your file with provided key.

To encrypt your file allow application to access for storage permission to select file.

Once file selected it will ask you for the encryption key, which should be minimum 16 char long.

Recommended is to auto generate key, which is UUID.
You can search for UUID on android developers site for more information.

Use checkbox to save your key to clipboard, for later use to decrypt file.
Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted file without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt option from the menu, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted files are stored separately on your device internal storage.

Note:
I can not guarantee for security of encrypted files that can never be cracked.
But i can assure you for algorithm standards used for encryption which is
Blowfish.
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal files.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Encrypt and decrypt your files.

title: Encrypt Decrypt Files

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Note:
Files which are encrypted with this application or with same algorithm used in this application only decrypted and vice versa.

This application does not encrypt or decrypt files which have different algorithm.

I can not guarantee for security of encrypted files that can never be cracked.
But i can assure you for algorithm standards used for encryption which is
Blowfish.



Encrypt and decrypt your personal files with secure algorithm.

This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your file with provided key.

To encrypt your file allow application to access for storage permission to select file.

Once file selected it will ask you for the encryption key, which should be minimum 6 char long.

Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted file without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt option from the menu, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted files are stored separately on your device internal storage.
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal files.
title: Encrypt Decrypt Files

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Note:
Files which are encrypted with this application or with same algorithm used in this application only decrypted and same goes for decryption.

This application does not encrypt or decrypt files which have used different algorithm.

I can not guarantee for security of encrypted files that can never be cracked.
But i can assure you for the algorithm standards used for encryption.

This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your file with key that you provide.


Steps:
To encrypt/decrypt your file allow application to access for storage permission to select file.

Once file selected it will ask you for the secure key, which should be minimum 6 char long.

Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted file without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt option from the menu, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted files are stored separately on your device internal storage root directory.
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal files.

title: Encrypt Decrypt Files

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Note:
Files which are encrypted with this application or with same algorithm used in this application only decrypted and same goes for encryption.

This application will not able to encrypt or decrypt files which have used different algorithm.

I can not guarantee for the security of encrypted files that can never be cracked.

But i can assure you for the algorithm standards used for encryption.

This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your file with key that you provide.


Steps:
To encrypt/decrypt your file allow application to access for storage permission to select file.

Once file selected it will ask you for the secure key, which should be minimum 6 char long.

Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted file without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt mode from the top left side of screen, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted files are stored separately on your device internal storage root directory.

ED (Will contain two child directories)
Encrypted Files - Will contains encrypted files
Decrypted Files - Will contains decrypted files
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal files.

title: Encrypt Decrypt Files

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Note:
Text which are encrypted with this application or with same algorithm used in this application only decrypted and same goes for encryption.

This application will not able to encrypt or decrypt text which have used different algorithm.

This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your text with key that you provide.


Steps:
To encrypt/decrypt your text enter or copy your message to text box.

Click on done icon and it will ask you for the secure key, which should be minimum 6 char long.

Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted text without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt mode from the top left side of screen, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted text will be visible in next screen with secure key.
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal messages.

Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted text without it.

Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt mode from the top left side of screen, then enter key.

All encrypted and decrypted text will be visible in next screen with secure key.
descriptionShort: Encrypt and decrypt your personal messages.

title: Encrypt Decrypt Text

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
This application uses Blowfish algorithm and encrypt your text with key that you provide.


Steps:
- To encrypt/decrypt your text enter or copy your message to text box.
- Click on done icon and it will ask you for the secure key, which should be minimum 6 char long.
- Remember that, if you forgot your key, you can not decrypt encrypted text without it.
- Flow is same for the decryption, select decrypt mode from the top left side of screen, then enter key.
- All encrypted and decrypted text will be visible in next screen with secure key.

Note:
Text which are encrypted with this application or with same algorithm used in this application only decrypted and same goes for encryption.

This application will not able to encrypt or decrypt text which have used different algorithm.
descriptionShort: Encrypt/decrypt your private or personal messages, share securely.

title: Encrypt Decrypt Text

creator: Tips Box
descriptionHtml:
Warning - Please read below app description very carefully

Basic Overview

+ This application is intended for experienced users only.
+ All text contents will be encrypted with your password.
+ If you forget your password, your data will be lost.
+ The correct password is the only way.

This app uses AES algorithm for text encryption. Click here for more information about AES Algorithm and it's Security.

What this app can't do.

This app can\'t decrypt Any Text which is encrypted with different Algorithm and PIN/Password.

Points to remember

For encryption make you sure to use a Password that you can Easily remember, because Correct password is the only way to Decrypt your encrypted text.

Simple PIN instead of text password is recommended to easily remember.

BE CAREFUL WITH YOUR PIN/PASSWORD.

We are not storing your PIN/Password on our server. So, if you forgot your PIN/Password you will not able to decrypt your encrypted text.

Additional Info

There is a limit of Maximum 65536 characters, you can\'t encrypt or decrypt text more than provided length.

After encryption completed, on new screen, you will get your PIN/Password and Encrypted text, You can copy both to clipboard.

We have added Ads for the Revenue purposes, So, encryption won't work offline

If you have any query regarding app, feel free to contact us, Click on menu icon on home page, select Contact Us and write your query.
descriptionShort: Please read app description very carefully before using this application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Ui - Simple and easy steps to encrypt text
Old Blowfish encryption is removed

We are not storing your PIN/Password on our server. So, if you forgot your PIN/Password you will not able to decrypt your encrypted text.

Additional Info

There is a limit of Maximum 65536 characters, you can\'t encrypt or decrypt text more than provided length.

After encryption completed, on new screen, you will get your PIN/Password and Encrypted text, You can copy both to clipboard.

We have added Ads for the Revenue purposes, So, encryption won't work offline

If you have any query regarding app, feel free to contact us, Click on menu icon on home page, select Contact Us and write your query.
descriptionShort: Please read app description very carefully before using this application.
